Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:You the Builder here? Good. Name's $Actor_60$, Farmer by trade. ]
[Name:Raining_1][Text:Miserable weather, but it makes my job easier so I can't complain, can I?]
[Name:Raining_2][Text:You're out and about in this? That's ... certainly a choice.]
[Name:How are you?][Text:I'm fine ... How are you?]
[Name:Grew yourself][Text:Ever eaten food you've grown yourself? I swear it tastes different, city people don't get it.][Default]
[Name:Collection][Text:This is... for me? Why? I mean... thank you.]

[Name:Task_15_Start][Text:Look, all I'm looking for is a nice, quiet place to settle down and to not be bothered by nobody. The sooner you build me a $WorldObject_6$, the sooner I can get to work.][UnlockObjectID:6]
[Name:JoinPartyNo][Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.]
